notes: External MCP defaults are managed in mcps.json; this file defines governance and validation metadata.

all-enabled.description: Enable all configured external MCP servers. Recommended default for this project.

research-only.description: Disable health and finance MCP tools when research-focused operation is needed.

minimal-risk.description: Disable browser-automation and personal-data MCPs for strict operation windows.

oura.purpose: Personal health and recovery metrics from Oura Ring.

yfinance.purpose: Market quotes, history, financial statements, options, and recommendations.

google_docs.purpose: Google Docs/Sheets/Drive authoring and data operations.
